module_restrictions: Not all courses are available in English. Time-table clashes may occur if taking modules from different faculties. It is recommended to take at least 50% of classes in the main major.
visa_info: EU citizens and citizens from several countries do not need a visa to enter Germany. Students from other countries must apply for a Student Applicant’s visa. Visa application process can take up to 2 months.
accommodations_info: The Studentenwerk Seezeit is the biggest provider of student housing in Konstanz, offering more than 1,800 places in their Halls of Residence. Rents range from €230 to €380 per month. Private housing options are available as well.
cost_of_living:
Estimated monthly living expenses breakdown:
- Accommodation: €230 - €420
- Health Insurance: €80
- Food: €120 - €250
- Others (Books, printing, entertainment etc.): €200 - €550
- Monthly Estimate: €630 - €1,300
